description:
The TakeDown crew is back and ready! This update starts with an impromptu fuck in Peter's living room with Jade Marxxx and Kylie Ireland, who are horny as hell and ready for some action. The guys are pumped and ready to go take down Felony in the basement, but these chicks need a bit of cock before they head downstairs.
Felony has come to the castle to live out her fantasy. Apparently, being bound, duct taped, blind folded, hooded, hand cuffed, fucked, choked, caned, flogged and slapped around by 3 guys is a longtime fantasy on hers! Lucky for her its our specialty! Stripped of her senses and overwhelmed with sensation Felony gets everything she asked for and more!
So tune in for episode 6 of MTD!!!
title: Midnight Takedown 6
